headline.main: Nazi Propaganda Analyzed; Unwitting Citizen Held to Be Involved in Current Technique

lead_paragraph: To THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: The nature and scope of Nazi propaganda are still a mystery to many Americans. Gone are the naive and obvious methods of paralyzing the American effort to resist the totalitarian drive toward world domination. In their place are subtle techniques, employed often unwittingly by sincere citizens.
